sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Gulo Mäkäda, ṭabiya Šäwit Lämläm, qušät ʿUra

note.ab: The library consists of some 55 MSS. In the past, many of them are said to have been kept at ʿUra Mäsqäl. 56 Mss. photographed: UM-001 "Homily of the Trinity"; UM-002 "Miracles of Jesus"; UM-003 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"; UM-004 "Homily of the Saviour of the World"; UM-005 "Synaxarion (March)"; UM-006 "Homily of St. Mary"; UM-007 "Missal"; UM-008 "Vita of Cyriacus"; UM-009 "Vita of Cyriacus"; UM-010 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; UM-011 "Homily of the Cross"; UM-012 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; UM-013 "Four Gospels"; UM-014 "Miracles of Mary"; UM-015 "Synaxarion (September)"; UM-016 "Miracles of Mary"; UM-017 "Missal"; UM-018 "Vitae of the Martyrs"; UM-019 "The Book of the Baptismal Rite"; UM-020 "Vita of Täklä Haymanot"; UM-021 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; UM-022 "Vita of St. Micheal"; UM-023 "Missal"; UM-024 "Psalter"; UM-025 "Collection of homilies"; UM-026 "Psalter"; UM-027 "Four Gospels"; UM-028 "Miracles of Jesus"; UM-029 "Miracles of Mary"; UM-030 "fragments of ca. 3 mss."; UM-031 "Psalter"; UM-032 "Homily of the Sabbath (by James of Sarugh)"; UM-033 "fragments of ca. 5 mss."; UM-034 "Miracles of Jesus"; UM-035 "Land charter of Tantaweddem"; UM-036 "A fragment of Psalter and other texts"; UM-037 "Acts of the Apostles"; UM-038 "separated leaves"; UM-039 "canonical-liturgical collection"; UM-040 "Pentateuch"; UM-041 "Vita of Cyriacus"; UM-042 "Miracles of Mary"; UM-043 "Psalter"; UM-044 "Synoptic Lectionary for the Year"; UM-045 "Collection of homilies"; UM-046 "Collection of homilies"; UM-047 "Missal"; UM-048 "Synoptic Lectionary for the Year"; UM-049 "Homily of St. Rufaʾel"; UM-050 "Four Gospels; Homilies; other texts"; UM-050a "Four Gospels"; UM-051 "separated leaves"; UM-052 "Litanies of the Morning"; UM-053 "Homily of St. Michael"; UM-054 "The Book of the Hours"; UM-055 "Homily of the Saviour of the World"; UM-056 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"
Tabots of Mary, Gabriel, George, Qirqos, Cross (the main one).
